text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
First, let's go meet the Umamusume who
we will be working with!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume you are in charge of is
called a trainable Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Please note you can't train a Umamusume
until you have obtained her training
version.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
In this gacha, you'll meet the Umamusume
you will be training!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Well then, let's draw from 
the Pretty Derby gacha!
